title.rendered: DSL provided financial support and education scholarship to the family of former employee Latifur Rahman Ripon

content.rendered:
Dongyi Sourcing Ltd (DSL), a Bangladesh-Based largest multinational apparel sourcing hub, provided financial support and education scholarship to the family of former employee Latifur Rahman Ripon on June 11, 2023 at Royal Cuisine Restaurant in the capital.


The handover ceremony was attended by DSL’s CEO & Managing Director Mohammad Pabel, Director Paritosh Chandra Das, and Chief Operating Officer (COO) Sunil Brahmbhatt. The event was hosted by Senior Manager- Admin & HR, Mr Sohanur Rahman.

“We always try to care for our DSL family members. Corporate social responsibility (CSR) is an integral part of sustainability. We are committed to doing something for his family in his absence,” said Mr. Pabel.

Mr. Paritosh Das echoed Mr. Pabel’s sentiment, saying, “We are committed to our family members. We were, we are, and we will always be with them in their good times and bad times.” He also added, “This is the first time we have experienced a loss in our family. Among the family members, Mr. Latifur Rahman Ripon (Q.A. – Auditor).”

DSL is a prominent readymade garment buying agent and exporter with a vision to deliver world-class service, quality solutions, and value-added services to end products for the textile industries on a global level, beginning from fabrics to fashion through market knowledge and experienced sourcing professionals. By 2030, DSL has the vision to be a $250 million worth company.
